TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
[Politics snipped] 

 

Don't forget the rules, guys

Im just going to bring my prior post to this page so the game can more easily continue.

reposting now:

SE: you are so hyper-focused your sense of time warps and tasks you think and feel are going quickly are in fact taking exceedingly long time periods. (Trivia this side effect is actually real, it comes packaged with adhd and its uh interesting to experience, ask me how i know lol)

SP: the ability to make anything rust at will

093509152023
 

end repost  

112909162023

Edited September 16, 2023 by AlamoVampire

SE: When you make something rust, it also rusts your blood. Yes, I know that's impossible, but we're talking about superpowers so checkmate.

SP: Redirect an airstrike to your position at any moment.

SE: you always redirect to yourself.

SP: chronomancy.

(blood can rust actually. The hemoglobin in blood carries iron, iron rusts, thus blood can rust. The more you know.) teehee

141209162023

SE: Time dilation.

SP: Summon a neutron star.

(acshully, blood cannot rust. As stated by a quick google search: Because the iron in the body is of the Fe oxidized variety, it does not react with water molecules.

Edited September 16, 2023 by TwoCalories

SE: its the size of a sugar grain.

SP: necromancy

(oxidized iron, IS rust. Oxidation is an oxygen reaction not a hydrological reaction. We are both right and we both be wrong, its a wash id say… side note someone in my neighborhoods grilling and OMG it smells good)

182309162023

Your side effect is that you are only able to necro forum threads. 

My superpower is the ability to breathe a very tenuous, high-carbon-dioxide atmosphere so I can walk around on Mars without an environmental suit. 

Spoiler

Interestingly, even a neutron star the size of a grain of sand would still weigh hundreds of kg, perhaps up to half a tonne. The ability to summon such an object at will would be incredibly powerful if used carefully. 

 

Edited September 17, 2023 by Deddly
I love neutron stars

SE: a regular (ie earths atmosphere) is now toxic to you.

SP: unchecked forum necro power

013509172023

Side effect: The forum moderators now all have you on ignore and can never see anything you say, not even in PMs. 

Superpower: I'd like to be able breathe on Earth again, please. I'm sstarting toget dizzzyy

SE: you can breathe again, but being ignored by all mods you never notice because you made me not exist.

SP: i exist for all to see

015409172023

SE: You get arrested for indecent exposure.

SP: I can get everyone to see my point of view.

SE: your point of view becomes your viewers point of view

SP: the power to unit humanity in song

105409172023

All humanity is physically and biologically linked together in a single unit. 

My superpower is to understand all languages.

SE: Your computer keeps swearing at you in binary.

SP: To always treat others with kindness while the world keeps treating me badly.

SE: The world treats you better, as kindness breeds kindness

SP: to have a computer that supports KSP2

SE: Your computer remains true to KSP2 but goes bankrupt waiting for it to be perfected.

SP: Always knowing what will make money.

You get what you ask for, but you turn into an ascetic. 

My superpower: the ability to turn into a flying tortoise at will.

SE: you turn into said tortoise but are stuck permanently as it

SP: to make offensive posts on any forum vanish

125909212023

SP: to delete myself from reality

SP: all d&d5E magics

012109222023

SE: the magic may only be used to seduce the enemy 

SP: You wake up every day with perfectly styled hair.

SE: It's only perfectly styled to any one person at a time. for all others you are wearing a live raccoon.

SP: Ability to create minecraft potions in real life.

Side effect: You become an NPC as part of The Yogscast's Shadow of Israphel series. The potions you make are part of real life, as far as you are concerned. 

My superpower: To will fanfic storytellers to complete their stories instead of letting them gradually fade away with no ending.
